([[Cesson-SÃ©vignÃ©]], [[France]], May 14, 1998) | World cup apps = 0 | World cup first = - | World cup best = - | Olympic apps = 0 | Olympic first = - | Olympic best = - | Regional name = [[CAF Women's Championship]] | Regional cup apps = 3 | Regional cup first = 2004 | Regional cup best = Group Stage (2004, 2006, 2010) | type=women }} The '''Algeria women's national football team''' represents [[Algeria]] in international [[women's football (soccer)|women's football]]. The team is currently ranked 78th in the world in the [[FIFA Women's World Rankings|FIFA women's rankings]].
